title: Anthropic Names Ex-Stripe CTO to Lead AI Infrastructure Push
description: Former Stripe CTO Rahul Patil joins Anthropic as new chief technical officer, signaling strategic expansion of AI capabilities and infrastructure development.
author: RADE AI Solutions

schema.headline: Anthropic Names Ex-Stripe CTO to Lead AI Infrastructure Push
schema.description: Analysis of Anthropic's strategic leadership changes, including the appointment of former Stripe CTO Rahul Patil and ex-Google executive Chris Ciauri, focusing on AI infrastructure development and global expansion.
schema.keywords: Anthropic, CTO, Rahul Patil, AI infrastructure, artificial intelligence, tech leadership, enterprise AI
